game.name: Realtime Screen OCR Translator
game.genres: Design & Illustration, Education, Utilities, Video Production
game.shortDescription: 실시간 OCR 지역 번역 - 지정한 화면 영역의 텍스트를 즉시 추출 & 번역. 원본 텍스트 변경 시 자동 갱신. 게임/동영상/소프트웨어에 최적화. 계정 불필요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Real-time OCR translator for ANY on-screen text - Instantly extracts & translates text from ANY screen area you select. Translations update automatically as the original text changes—perfect for games, apps, and videos. No accounts or setup needed!
